messages.subject: Sweet article, Djinn
messages.msgSnippet: I really enjoyed it. Can I Ctrl-C it and put it in Adobe as long as I give ya proper credit? I m writing another book- this one a sort of fantasy samurai thing
messages.messageBody:
I really enjoyed it. Can I Ctrl-C it and put it in Adobe as long as I
give ya proper credit? I'm writing another book- this one a sort of
fantasy samurai thing (yeha, I know, I know) and your article helped
immensely. I'd like to be able to refer to it- maybe you could send
me the version with footnotes?

Thanks to all in the group for the resources and great discussion,

Lili
